abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox trade four prospects to San Diego Padres for pitcher Craig Kimbrel.
lead_paragraph: The San Diego Padres traded Kimbrel, who had 39 saves in 43 chances after joining the team last season from Atlanta, for four of Boston’s minor league prospects.

headline.main: Red Sox Acquire Star Closer Craig Kimbrel

snippet: The San Diego Padres traded Kimbrel, who had 39 saves in 43 chances after joining the team last season from Atlanta, for four of Boston’s minor league prospects.
